header.the_what: The what, who, why, and how

our_journey.we_never_thought: We never thought that this thing could actually became something like what it is today; let alone something that could be useful for a very few niche of people.
our_journey.millions_campaigns: Millions of campaigns {supporters} later; we believe that we‚Äôre only at the beginning.
our_journey.millions_supporters: (and hundreds of millions of their supporters)

our_milestones.1_detail: It all started with the intention of helping friends generate twibbons for campus events
our_milestones.2_detail: We took it seriously and formed a 3-member team; Mulqan the solo-fighter and Fokker & Nino the childhood friends.
our_milestones.3_detail: Thanks to Indonesia's Independence Day, the general public noticed us. We managed to gain 1 million users!
our_milestones.4_detail: Seeing a lot of heartfelt responses, we took more effort into fixing the website and launched Twibbonize version 2.0!
our_milestones.5_detail: During the pandemic, the Indonesian Ministry of State-Owned Company created #SiapDivaksin campaign on our website which led us to 5 million users!
our_milestones.6_detail: As we gained more publicity from community-based creators (mainly government institutions and big companies), we hit 12 million active users.
our_milestones.7_detail: We successfully charmed Southeast Asian countries. Our users kept growing, mainly from Thailand and the Philippines.
our_milestones.8_detail: A year has passed since we first took a serious step in developing the website. We decided to launch Twibbonize version 3.0!
our_milestones.9_detail: More than 7 thousand active campaigns were generated during the Philippines Presidential Election. This kept us growing in the global digital campaign scene.
our_milestones.10_detail: India‚Äôs Independence Day marked our significant user growth in India. This month we got over 28 Million sessions on our website.
our_milestones.11_detail: We found our users grew significantly in Brazil during Brazil‚Äôs Presidential Election.
our_milestones.12_detail: We launched our Premium subscription plans.
our_milestones.13_detail: We released Twibbonize Editor, allowing users to design Twibbon directly on our website.
our_milestones.14_detail: We launched Twibbonize 4.0 with a fresh look and major updates!

history.in_this: In this digital era, social media has become the go-to platform for one to express support, concerns, and other sentiments
history.however: However, we sometimes struggle with finding the right words and actions to convey our thoughts effectively
history.visual_factor: Visual factor holds great power in this context. Twibbon is a simple solution to become the extension of the ideas you want to convey

header.we_love: We'd love to hear from you! Questions, feedback, or just to say hello, drop us a message below. We'll get back to you ASAP!

office.our_office: Nestled in the heart of Indonesia üáÆüá©
office.we_like_our_home: We like our home like we like our designs; clean and minimal. We‚Äôre based in the heart of beautiful Jakarta, so don‚Äôt hesitate to visit by bike, commuter line, or busway too. We have an open door policy.

team.our_philosophy: Our philosophy is simple ‚Äî hire a team of diverse, passionate people and foster a culture that empowers you to do you best work.

about.fokker_bio_1: Fokkerizky graduated from Universitas Indonesia with a degree in Economics Science, but his true passion lies in software engineering, graphic design, and the startup industry. He has been involved in startups since his university days, eventually teaming up with Mulqan, the founder of Twibbonize, and his childhood friend, Bernino.
about.fokker_bio_2: Initially serving as Twibbonize's COO, Fokkerizky played a crucial role in product development, earning Mulqan's trust to lead the team. After a year of proving his capabilities, Fokkerizky assumed the role of CEO, poised to steer Twibbonize towards success.
about.bernino_bio_2: Since the beginning, Bernino has consistently led the Dev Team of Twibbonize in executing innovations and providing a seamless platform for our users precisely for their needs. His dedication and passion are something that has become his charm, not only as one of the leaders of Twibbonize, but also as a person.
about.mulqan_bio_1: Having a background in Information Technology doesn‚Äôt stop Mulqan from being someone who is also passionate about business for the greater good of everyone. His strong will and problem-solving nature always make him known as someone with great vision, which is always reflected in his work.
about.aditya_bio_2: Aditya's laid-back and humorous personality makes him enjoyable to work with, yet he maintains a high degree of professionalism. Despite being the only frontend developer at Twibbonize, he consistently delivers projects quickly and effectively, demonstrating a level of dedication that sets him apart.
about.farhan_bio_1: Farhan was one of the first team members to join Twibbonize, alongside Aditya, after the Board of Directors. Despite always working remotely, he has maintained an impressive level of performance. His sharp analytical skills make him a key problem solver, a role he shares with Bernino.
about.farhan_bio_2: Farhan's cleverness and reliability are essential to the team, earning him the reputation of being the go-to person for resolving technical disputes. His consistent contributions and problem-solving expertise are deeply valued at Twibbonize, demonstrating that remote work doesn't hinder his ability to deliver results.
about.dominick_bio_1: Dominick is one of the most versatile team members at Twibbonize. She started as a Customer Excellence Officer, then moved to Human Resources after just six months. After a year in HR, she led the content marketing team. Lately, she‚Äôs been helping the Board of Directors with general affairs and business development works.
about.dominick_bio_2: Dominick graduated from Universitas Indonesia with a degree in English Studies. Despite her writing background, she excels in any role she's given. Her versatility and passion for her work make her a key asset to the team.
about.mahardika_bio_1: Mahardika's strength lies in his creativity and unique sense of style. He consistently brings innovative ideas that go beyond the conventional. His passion for both technology and art makes him a standout designer. Mahardika graduated with a degree in Fine Art from a private university in Bandung, Indonesia, and he's been deeply involved in the art world ever since.
about.mahardika_bio_2: Currently, Mahardika is responsible for the visual branding at Twibbonize. His distinct personality and design approach add vibrant character to Twibbonize's identity as a company and as a brand.
about.sebastian_bio_1: Sebastian is one of the most dedicated team members at Twibbonize, distinguished by his remarkable work ethic. He has been working remotely from Russia since joining the company, as he is also pursuing his master's degree.
about.sebastian_bio_2: Despite the distance, Sebastian plays an integral role in supporting user inquiries, resolving issues in collaboration with the Development Team, and offering valuable insights that enhance the overall user experience on the platform. His quick thinking and problem-solving skills make him an invaluable asset to Twibbonize.
about.helena_bio_1: Helena has been responsible for Quality Assurance at Twibbonize since she joined the company. Her meticulous attention to detail, practical approach, and organizational skills have allowed her to excel in this role from the start.
about.farizky_bio_2: As a native of Yogyakarta, Indonesia, a city renowned for its artistic heritage, Farizky has always remained dedicated to his love for design and mentoring. Outside of work, he often participates in UX design communities, where he mentors younger designers. His interests range from creating interactive designs to auditing systems through coding, reflecting his broad expertise in the field.
about.yoga_bio_1: Yoga is an exceptional fullstack developer--a coding wizard. He's a close friend of Mulqan from their university days, alongside Zikri, which gave him early insight into Twibbonize, even before it became a company.
about.yoga_bio_2: Like Zikri, Yoga joined Twibbonize on Mulqan's recommendation. Initially a junior Product Developer, he quickly stood out for his coding ability and deep understanding of product development. Yoga's disciplined work ethic shows in the flawless results he consistently delivers. His commitment to excellence has made him a key contributor to Twibbonize's success.
about.safira_bio_1: Safira joined Twibbonize immediately after graduating with a degree in Accounting, securing a position on the Finance team. Despite her limited experience, she quickly displayed a strong understanding of general office operations, leading to her promotion to oversee HR and General Affairs in addition to her finance role.
about.fahmi_bio_2: Fahmi's cheerful disposition is as notable as his technical expertise‚Äîhis laughter is as frequent as his outstanding work. However, it's his professionalism and commitment to quality that truly stand out. Even as the sole Mobile Developer for a while, Fahmi's performance consistently exceeded expectations, delivering excellent results.
about.chandra_bio_1: Chandra recently joined Twibbonize, following in the footsteps of Fahmi, who is also a university acquaintance of Bernino. He was brought on board to help Fahmi manage an increased workload.
about.harry_bio_1: Harry Sugama is a co-founder and advisor at Twibbonize, where he provides strategic guidance. He also advises The Asia Group on business development and international partnerships. Previously, he managed financial operations and strategic planning as Finance and Accounting Manager at Blue Waves Group Ventures.
about.harry_bio_2: Harry holds a degree in Accounting from Padjadjaran University and furthered his studies at Ludwig-Maximilians-Universit√§t M√ºnchen. With expertise in finance, business strategy, and cross-cultural communication, he is known for his analytical skills and has been key to the growth of the companies he advises, especially Twibbonize.
about.angel_bio_1: Angel is the freelance UX Writer who has helped us throughout the development of our website since Twibbonize website version 2.0. With a solid professional background in UX Writing, Angel seamlessly blends the art of storytelling with data-driven insights to create intuitive and engaging user experiences.
about.angel_bio_2: Her expertise in crafting clear and concise content ensures that every interaction is meaningful and accessible, enhancing the overall user journey on our platform.

faq.question_1: Are the watermark-free and ad-free features only available to Twibbonize Premium account holders?
faq.answer_1: Watermark-free and ad-free are two exclusive features for Twibbonize Premium users. These features allow users to download twibbon without any watermark and enjoy the Twibbonize experience without disruptive ads
faq.question_2: How can we provide the free version of Twibbonize?
faq.answer_2: There are ads in every campaign page in Twibbonize that allow us to grow and provide more campaign pages. Of course, we are trying to manage these ads, so they won't disturb your campaign's quality and experience.
faq.question_3: What does ‚ÄúAd-Free‚Äù mean for the Twibbonize Premium users?
faq.answer_3: ‚ÄúAd-Free‚Äù for Twibbonize Premium users means an uninterrupted experience with no advertisements. It allows for a cleaner, more user-friendly navigation throughout the Twibbonize platform.
faq.question_4: What can we customise in the campaign?
faq.answer_4: Twibbonize Premium users can customise the background and color of your campaign page on Twibbonize according to your brand or taste. So that your campaign can look different from the others.
faq.answer_5: With private campaign feature, you can set your campaign to be visible only to certain people.
faq.question_6: What kind of information do I get in Analytics?
faq.answer_6: Analytics provide you with campaigns data. Those data include supporters, interactions, visitors, country & cities, and each module‚Äôs interactions data. With this information, you can predict and measure how successful your campaign is.
faq.answer_7: You can easily pay online via a bank transfer, using a credit card, or e-wallet.
faq.answer_8: You can easily download the invoice directly from your Twibbonize account.
faq.question_9: Where can I find help related to Twibbonize usage?
faq.answer_9: If you are looking for the ‚ÄúFAQ‚Äù page related to Twibbonize usage, click Help Center

header.read_stories: Read stories from companies and organisations who successfully utilised our platform for their campaign programs

aiesec.title: Embracing The Convenience Of Twibbonize, Just Like AIESEC
aiesec.paragraph_2: Millania then explained how she and her team are used to making a frame picture manually, where everybody has to input and adjust their pictures in the frame manually. With Twibbonize, she is then able to make a digital campaign in a very convenient way, so it‚Äôs very practical. Not to mention that the campaign distribution is also perceived to be relatively easy, leaving their only task is to choose the picture, and you‚Äôll have your Twibbon set up in no time.

corporate.tip_8: When creating Twibbon campaign for company programs or events, make sure the leaders take the first proactive movement. Make sure to also do a comprehensive distribution of information regarding the campaign internally. These hopefully can give employees more motivation to join the campaign.

education.paragraph_1: Twibbonize is a dynamic tool that brings a festive spirit to every part of education. Whether it's non-program events like member registration or anniversaries, or program-related activities such as scholarships, meetings, and fun events like talk shows and job fairs, Twibbonize catalyzes visual celebration. Explore how this innovative tool unites students, faculty, and institutions, weaving a shared tapestry of pride and enthusiasm across the educational landscape.

entertainment.caption_6: During FIFA World Cup 2022, one of our creators created an Argentina twibbon frame for Facebook profile picture to show their support for the club.

events.paragraph_3: The adoption of event-specific frames on social media platforms becomes a pivotal element in the digital marketing strategy for Organizers to promote their events. It serves as a visually compelling call-to-action, prompting the general public and their target market to engage with the event tangibly. When these twibbon frames circulate on participants" profiles or exist in their social media posts, participants have already contributed to the event"s online presence, creating a buzz that extends beyond traditional promotional methods. This user-driven content becomes a valuable asset for digital marketing campaigns, providing authentic and visually appealing material to showcase the event across various digital channels that benefit the Organizers and the event.
events.paragraph_4: Organizers from different industries can adapt and implement these functions at various events across music, fashion, conventions, awards, film, food and beverages, bazaars, workshops, sports, even competitions. We try to collect various examples from real creators on our platform that utilize Twibbonize as an extension of their Marketing measure by utilizing twibbon frames that you can learn from.

personal.caption_2: Tailored for the general public, Frizz Digital created a Birthday Twibbon that serves as a delightful digital accessory to elevate the celebratory spirit of birthdays.

social.paragraph_8: For social causes demanding action, such as the Women's March, Twibbonize provides a visually compelling platform for advocates to unite. Creating a dedicated Twibbon allows participants to showcase their involvement in this empowering movement proudly. This powerful tool becomes a symbol of collective participation, fostering a sense of community and anticipation as individuals proudly showcase their connection to the upcoming gathering or act. Twibbonize transforms online support into a dynamic force for change, visually connecting activists and supporters across the globe.
social.caption_9: Twibbonize provides a platform for organisations and their members to express their individuality and commemorate significant milestones.
social.paragraph_10: When celebrating or commemorating significant events, like Pride Month, Twibbonize becomes a digital canvas for expressing solidarity and appreciation. Take a look at this Pride Month campaign from TaskUs. By adopting a themed Twibbon, individuals, and organisations can visually mark the occasion, contributing to a collective celebration online. The shared Twibbon becomes a symbol of unity, allowing participants to showcase their unique selves and their commitment to honouring their history in fighting for equality, as well as improving the sense of belonging within the community. Twibbonize transforms digital spaces into vibrant hubs of celebration and remembrance.
social.paragraph_11: As we embrace the digital era's capacity for connectivity, let Twibbonize continue to paint our screens with symbols of solidarity, creating a lasting impact in the realm of social advocacy. Together, we weave a visual narrative that transcends boundaries, echoing our shared commitment to a more compassionate and united world.
